question: 価格
sourceMnemonic: When you <kanji>value</kanji> <kanji>status</kanji> you really care about how much the <vocabulary>price</vocabulary> of things are. The more things <vocabulary>cost</vocabulary>, the more you <vocabulary>value</vocabulary> them.
